description: Yoga is 99% Practice and 1 % theory ..........Proud to share #celebration #yoga day with all our corporates across the month and also introduced Sound Healing...
cleaned_text: Yoga is 99% Practice and 1 % theory ..........Proud to share [#celebration](https://www.linkedin.com/signup/cold-join?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Ffeed%2Fhashtag%2Fcelebration&trk=public_post-text) [#yoga](https://www.linkedin.com/signup/cold-join?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Ffeed%2Fhashtag%2Fyoga&trk=public_post-text) day with all our corporates across the month and also introduced Sound Healing , along with [#yoga](https://www.linkedin.com/signup/cold-join?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Ffeed%2Fhashtag%2Fyoga&trk=public_post-text) [#meditation](https://www.linkedin.com/signup/cold-join?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Ffeed%2Fhashtag%2Fmeditation&trk=public_post-text) [#wellnessatwork](https://www.linkedin.com/signup/cold-join?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Ffeed%2Fhashtag%2Fwellnessatwork&trk=public_post-text) Thanking all our partners for the Our mission to take the benefits of Natural healing and therapies continues !!
